profile.name: Tarcisio Bispo de Araujo
profile.title: UX/Product Designer focused on strategy, impact and experience
profile.bio: I am a UX/Product Designer with strong experience in designing digital products focused on user experience, conversion and business impact. With a background in Digital Marketing, SEO and AI, I integrate strategy, design and usability into continuous improvement and innovation processes.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: UX/Product Design projects focused on strategy, impact and user experience.

fgvLaw.title: FGV LAW
fgvLaw.overview: Restructuring of FGV LAW's legal courses area focusing on usability and information organization. The project aimed to increase the visibility of offerings and facilitate navigation between options.
fgvLaw.discovery: I identified that users had difficulty locating and comparing courses. The current structure caused confusion and dispersion. Through interviews and heuristic analysis, I realized that the excess of content was not helping in the decision, but rather hindering it.
fgvLaw.solution: I designed a new panel with a tab system and thematic filters, reorganizing the visual and informational hierarchy. The options were grouped based on user objectives (legal area, course type, workload).
fgvLaw.iteration: After user testing, we simplified filter terminology and adjusted the order of information based on direct feedback. I refined the layout for quick reading and mobile adaptation.
outcomes: Significant increase in visibility and interaction with courses
Improvement in conversion rate from visits to enrollments or leads
Reduction in navigation time to the desired course selection
fgvLaw.insights: Navigation structure needs to guide, not just show. Clarity and relevant grouping directly influence the perceived value of a course.

taliparts.title: Taliparts
taliparts.overview: Structuring and digital validation project for Taliparts, focused on publishing auto parts on Mercado Livre, with integration to physical operations. The goal was to learn quickly, at low cost, about real demand, buyer behavior and competitive advantage.
taliparts.discovery: I conducted a detailed benchmark with automotive competitors. I interviewed mechanics and store owners, modeled personas and applied the CSD Matrix to identify certainties, assumptions and doubts in the physical catalog.
taliparts.solution: I developed a minimum viable product (MVP) for digital cataloging and publishing, with automated data validation and integration with Mercado Livre's API. Created a simple interface for inventory management and sales tracking.
taliparts.iteration: Based on initial sales data and user feedback, we adjusted pricing strategies and improved product descriptions with technical specifications that customers were looking for.
outcomes: 70% reduction in time to publish new items
30% increase in sales conversion compared to traditional methods
Creation of a scalable process for catalog expansion
taliparts.insights: In B2B, the main challenge is often operational efficiency rather than just the interface. Understanding the business context is as important as the user experience.

backlog1.title: Digital Catalog Structure
backlog1.description: Challenge of organizing and publishing products on marketplace

details.problem: Difficulty in efficiently organizing and publishing products on the marketplace, resulting in low visibility and sales.
details.solution: Development of an intuitive digital catalog structure with smart categorization and batch publishing.

details.problem: Conversion rate below industry average on the product page.
details.solution: Redesign of the product page focusing on strategic CTAs, clear technical information, and social proof.

details.problem: Lack of in-depth understanding about B2B clients' needs and pain points.
details.solution: Conducting qualitative research with B2B users to map journeys, pain points, and improvement opportunities.

details.problem: Application loading time higher than expected, impacting user experience.
details.solution: Code, images, and resources optimization to improve overall application performance.

backlog5.title: Real-time Notification System
backlog5.description: Push notifications implementation for user engagement

details.problem: Low user engagement after first access.
details.solution: Development of a real-time notification system to keep users engaged.

details.problem: Difficulty in visualizing and analyzing important metrics for decision making.
details.solution: Development of an interactive dashboard with key business metrics.
